description.narrative: The objective of the Third Capital Market Development Program (CMDP3) is the enhanced capacity and size of the capital market that is grounded on a strong legal and regulatory framework.

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President

description.narrative: Enhanced capacity and size of the capital market in a strong legal and regulatory framework

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President
Stock market capitalization increases to 20.4% of gross domestic product by December 2017 (FY2015 baseline: 17.6%)

description.narrative: Enhanced capacity and size of the capital market in a strong legal and regulatory framework

title.narrative: Total value of corporate bonds issued increases to Tk19 billion by December 2017 (FY2014 baseline: Tk15.6 billion)

description.narrative: Enhanced capacity and size of the capital market in a strong legal and regulatory framework

title.narrative: Enlistment of new securities increases to 570 by December 2017 (FY2015 baseline: 555)
